T02D2476:159b-1: aa bhi she ka ni rukti /
T02D2476:159b-3: dbang bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa /
T02D2476:159b-4: bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2476:159b-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2476:159b-6: sku gnyis kyis gnas khyab pa po //
T02D2476:159b-7: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //
T02D2476:159b-8: rtag pa rdo rje 'chang btud de //
T02D2476:159b-9: dbang gi don ni nges brjod bya //
T02D2476:159b-10: de ltar nyid du yod pa yi //
T02D2476:159b-11: mnyam 'jug rgya chen bde ba che //
T02D2476:159b-12: de ni bsgrub bya yin sems pa //
T02D2476:159b-13: dbang gi rjes thogs grol 'gyur bas //
T02D2476:159b-14: de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T02D2476:159b-15: mnyam 'jug rgya chen gzhan ltos pa //
T02D2476:159b-16: rang dbang grub pa ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D2476:159b-17: nyams bcas ji ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur //
T02D2476:159b-18: rigs 'gyur btang ste nyams pa'i phyir //
T02D2476:159b-19: de bas bsgrub bya zag med pa //
T02D2476:159b-20: nyams pa med pa bla med pa //
T02D2476:159b-21: bde ba dri med nam mkha' 'dra //
T02D2476:159b-22: 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad spyod pa'o //
T02D2476:160a-2: chos kyi sku zhes dran par bya //
T02D2476:160a-3: de la brten nas sku ni yang //
T02D2476:160a-4: longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2476:160a-5: de la brten rnams bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2476:160a-6: theg pa chen po bla med pas //
T02D2476:160a-7: bdag gzhan don dag bsgrub bya'i phyir //
T02D2476:160a-8: gzhan du de yang dgos ba med //
T02D2476:160a-9: de bsgoms pas bsgrub bya ba yi //
T02D2476:160a-10: sku ni pha rol phyin theg par //
T02D2476:160a-11: rab gsal ro gcig bsam mi khyab //
T02D2476:160a-12: chos zhes bya ba 'dir thub chen //
T02D2476:160a-13: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
T02D2476:160a-14: bsgoms pa nyid kyi stobs kyis kyang //
T02D2476:160a-15: sbyin sogs las kyi thob bya ba /
T02D2476:160a-16: de gtsor gyur pa'i gnyis pa'o //
T02D2476:160a-17: 'dir yang sku gsum bsgrub bya nyid //
T02D2476:160a-18: pha rol phyin pa'i rim bzhin du //
T02D2476:160a-19: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02D2476:160a-20: bsam gtan shes rab sogs ming gis //
T02D2476:160a-21: rnal 'byor rgyud du'ang bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2476:160a-22: lha yi rnam pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2476:160a-23: gtso bo dang ni dkyil 'khor ba //
T02D2476:160a-24: spro ba dang ni bsdus pas so //
T02D2476:160a-25: la lar bde chen bsam mi khyab //
T02D2476:160a-26: bsgoms pa nyid kyi stobs kyis kyang //
T02D2476:160a-27: bsgrub bya sku gnyis brtan gyur pa //
T02D2476:160a-28: mdor na lhan cig skyes grags pa'o //
T02D2476:160a-29: chos rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //
T02D2476:160a-30: de nyid las byung bsgom pa dang //
T02D2476:160a-31: lus la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang //
T02D2476:160a-32: de yi rang bzhin nyid brtags nas //
T02D2476:160a-33: rnam pa gnyis par bgrang bya ba //
T02D2476:160a-34: rgyu ni bsod nams tshogs nyid kyis //
T02D2476:160a-35: lhan cig skyes grags rnal 'byor zhes //
T02D2476:160a-36: bsgrub bya de bzhin sku gnyis po'ang //
T02D2476:160a-37: de phyir rgyud rnams thams cad du //
T02D2476:160a-38: phyag rgya nyid kyi brda dang ni //
T02D2476:160a-39: ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon bya ba //
T02D2476:160a-40: dbang bskur bas ni chos sku'o //
T02D2476:160a-41: gtso bo de nyid gcig pu zhig / mtshon par
T02D2476:160a-42: bya ba 'ga' yis rig /'di ni de nyid thabs
T02D2476:160a-43: bcas pas // mtshon par bya ba gzhan dag 'dod //
T02D2476:160a-44: phyag rgya yi ni sku gsum mo //
T02D2476:160a-45: rnam par phye nas mtshon bya ba //
T02D2476:160a-46: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur zhes //
T02D2476:160a-47: mkhas pa rnams ni smra bar byed //
T02D2476:160a-48: de la phyogs dang po'i dgongs pa 'di yin te /
T02D2476:160a-49: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D2476:160b-0: pa longs spyod rdzogs pa dang @160b sprul pa'i sku'i
T02D2476:160b-2: yid bzhin nor bu ltar 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad pa /
T02D2476:160b-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon spangs pa /
T02D2476:160b-4: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi sa bon gyi gnas //
T02D2476:160b-5: kun gzhi gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can chos kyi sku zhes bya ba /
T02D2476:160b-6: 'bras bu'i gtso bo shin tu rnam par dag pa
T02D2476:160b-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo ni bsgom pas bsgrub
T02D2476:160b-8: par bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bstan te
T02D2476:160b-9: // de mi shes pas ni bsgom par mi nus pa'i phyir dang //
T02D2476:160b-10: da ltar ni de la dmigs pa'i ye shes med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2476:160b-11: de thob par byed pa'i ched du bsgom pa don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2476:160b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la rag lus pa
T02D2476:160b-13: yin pas de la mngon du phyogs pa ma yin
T02D2476:160b-14: te thob par rigs pa ma yin no //
T02D2476:160b-15: de lta bas na de ston par byed pa de
T02D2476:160b-16: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D2476:160b-17: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog ba
T02D2476:160b-18: bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba nyid
T02D2476:160b-19: kyis de kho na nyid dang cha 'dra bas /
T02D2476:160b-20: de nyid ni 'di yin no zhes dus phyis de bzhin du mos pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2476:160b-21: rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyag
T02D2476:160b-22: rgya dang yang dag par sbyor bas bla ma'i man
T02D2476:160b-23: ngag nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems nor bu'i nang
T02D2476:160b-25: phyir shor ba gnyis kyi bar na gang dmigs pa
T02D2476:160b-26: de gzhan dmigs pa thams cad dang 'gal bar gyur
T02D2476:160b-27: pa gnyis su med par snang ba bde ba chen
T02D2476:160b-28: po'i ye shes kyi snang ba can de ni dper
T02D2476:160b-29: gyur pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2476:160b-30: de nyams su myong bas 'dra bar 'gyur pa nges
T02D2476:160b-31: par bya ba yin pas dpes bstan par bya ba
T02D2476:160b-32: yang don dam pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2476:160b-33: dpe 'dis legs par mtshon par bya ba nyid de //
T02D2476:160b-34: thar pa 'dod pa don dam pa'i ye shes la
T02D2476:160b-35: mos ba rnams la dpe 'dis nye bar bstan par
T02D2476:160b-37: der dam pa'i ye shes bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis des par byas nas /
T02D2476:160b-38: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas lha'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2476:160b-39: lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2476:161a-0: nam mkha'i rdo rje bsgoms pas des mtshon pa'i de kho na @161a * //
T02D2476:161a-1: nyid mchog tu gus pas rgyun mi 'chad par dam tshig dang ldan pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2476:161a-2: bsgom pa de yongs su rdzogs pa na lha la sogs pa bsgoms pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2476:161a-3: dam tshig gis phye ba'i bdag nyid kyi bde ba
T02D2476:161a-4: nyid du 'jug pas myur du sku gsum thob par
T02D2476:161a-5: 'gyur ro // de bas na shes rab ye shes
T02D2476:161a-6: kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su gtso bo chos kyi
T02D2476:161a-7: sku gcig pu nyid sku gnyis kyi rten du gyur
T02D2476:161a-8: pa kho na mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes
T02D2476:161a-9: phyogs dang po smra bar byed par sems so //
T02D2476:161a-10: yang phyogs gnyis pa'i bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2476:161a-11: bde ba chen po zag pa med pa nyams par
T02D2476:161a-12: mi 'gyur ba bsgrub par bya ba yin na yang
T02D2476:161a-13: de lta na yang de ni sgrub pa med par
T02D2476:161a-15: de lta bas na de bzhin du de'i sgrub pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2476:161a-16: de'i sgrub pa byed pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D2476:161a-18: bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo de yin no ;
T02D2476:161a-19: / dam tshig ji lta ba dang mngon par rtogs
T02D2476:161a-20: pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2476:161a-21: thams cad lha la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rgyud
T02D2476:161a-22: las rgyas btab la de nyid kyang shes rab ye
T02D2476:161a-23: shes kyi dbang bskur ba de kho na de nyid
T02D2476:161a-24: kyi mtshan nyid can gyi ye shes bskyed pa la
T02D2476:161a-25: rgyu nyid yin pas brtson pa nas bzung nas ji
T02D2476:161a-26: ltar 'byung ba bzhin du yang dag par mtshon par
T02D2476:161a-28: de la re zhig mdor bsdu na dpal gsang ba
T02D2476:161a-29: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan
T02D2476:161a-30: nyid dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos 'dod par bya
T02D2476:161a-31: ba'i phyag rgya gang gi gzugs la sogs pa gang
T02D2476:161a-32: mthong ba dang / nu ma sra ba la sogs pa la reg pa dang /
T02D2476:161a-33: chags pa dang bcas pa'i tshig thos pa dang /
T02D2476:161a-34: ma mchu'i ro myang ba dang /
T02D2476:161a-35: lus su gtogs pa'i ri dags kyi lte ba'i dri la snom pa dang /
T02D2476:161a-36: de rnams sgyu ma lta bu nyid du nges par
T02D2476:161a-37: spyod pa de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
T02D2476:161a-38: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de
T02D2476:161a-40: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag po'i
T02D2476:161a-41: ngo bo nyid ni tshogs kyi lam gyis bsdus pa'i
T02D2476:161a-42: rtsom pa nyid yin par mtshon par bya'o //
T02D2476:161a-43: gang phyag rgya de nyid la dam du 'khyud pa
T02D2476:161a-44: dang du len pa'i nu ma la sogs pa sra
T02D2476:161a-45: ba gang yin pa ni sa'i ngo bo nyid reg
T02D2476:161b-0: pa'i @161b ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa ste
T02D2476:161b-1: / rang gi snang ba tsam nyid yin pas phyi
T02D2476:161b-2: rol na don mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems gzhan du
T02D2476:161b-4: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i shes pa dang lhan cig
T02D2476:161b-5: skyes pa'i dga' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam
T02D2476:161b-7: sangs rgyas spyan dang gti mug dang longs spyod du rnam par gzhag pa'i gti mug dga' ma dang /
T02D2476:161b-8: gti mug rdo rje ste thabs rnam par gzhag pa
T02D2476:161b-9: bsnyen pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi yan lag dang po
T02D2476:161b-10: ste / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pas
T02D2476:161b-11: bsdus pa de'i rjes thegs la mtshon par bya ba
T02D2476:161b-13: bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i sbyor pa ni //
T02D2476:161b-14: gang yin bsnyen pa yin par 'dod //
T02D2476:161b-16: 'di dang phyis 'byung ba dag la rnam par snang
T02D2476:161b-17: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2476:161b-18: bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang /
T02D2476:161b-19: gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D2476:161b-20: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D2476:161b-21: shes pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma dang slob ma
T02D2476:161b-22: dag gis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du spro
T02D2476:161b-23: ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa bya ba yin
T02D2476:161b-24: no // de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
T02D2476:161b-25: de nyid kyi padma'i lus dang ngag dang yid stong
T02D2476:161b-26: pa nyid kyi gru gsum pa nang stong pa nyid
T02D2476:161b-27: no // dang / gong ma gong ma'i sa rnam
T02D2476:161b-28: par dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir steng yangs
T02D2476:161b-29: no // dang / pa dang / dmigs par gyur
T02D2476:161b-30: pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2476:161b-31: ngo bo dbyer med pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D2476:161b-32: kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2476:161b-33: dbyug pa ltar sra zhing mkhrang ba nyid kyis nam
T02D2476:161b-34: mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i stong pa nyid la dmigs pa
T02D2476:161b-35: yin pas / kha gyen du bltas pa'i rdo rje
T02D2476:161b-36: dang gnyis su med par byed pa ni ma mthong
T02D2476:161b-37: pa'i chos kyi dbyings mthong ba yin la zag pa
T02D2476:161b-38: med pa'i lam gyi ngo bo ste /
T02D2476:161b-39: chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba rab tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T02D2476:161b-40: de ni phyag rgya las shes par bya'o //
T02D2476:161b-41: de la gang gis rdo rje dang padma dag gnyis
T02D2476:161b-42: su med par byed pa'i ye shes gang yin pa
T02D2476:161b-43: de dag bye zhing bral ba'i bdag nyid la rgyab
T02D2476:161b-44: kyis phyogs pa gang dmigs par gyur pa de chu'i
T02D2476:162a-0: @162a * // khams kyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2476:162a-1: gang de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang
T02D2476:162a-2: yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa
T02D2476:162a-3: dang / zhe sdang dang bdag med ma dang /
T02D2476:162a-4: longs spyod du rnam par gzhag pas zhe sdang dga' ma dang zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D2476:162a-5: thabs rnam par gzhag pa'i yan lag gnyis ba nye
T02D2476:162a-6: bar bsgrub pa ste rjes thogs su mtshon par bya
T02D2476:162a-8: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D2476:162a-9: nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par 'dod //
T02D2476:162a-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi yangs
T02D2476:162a-12: pa'i padma chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'i nang du
T02D2476:162a-13: 'jug cing 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yang
T02D2476:162a-14: dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bos yang dang yang
T02D2476:162a-15: du gcig tu der zhen pas gang rnam pa thams
T02D2476:162a-16: cad du mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2476:162a-17: zag pa med pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo'i
T02D2476:162a-18: // de ni phyag rgya las rig par bya'o //
T02D2476:162a-19: de la gang padma'i nang du btsud pa la zhen pa'i shes pa dang /
T02D2476:162a-20: gang de'i dmigs par gyur pa gtsubs pa'i dbang gis
T02D2476:162a-21: dro ba nyid ni me'i khams kyi ngo bo ste
T02D2476:162a-22: / de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang
T02D2476:162a-23: yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha'
T02D2476:162a-24: / yas dang / 'dod chags kyi gos dkar mo dang /
T02D2476:162a-25: longs spyod du rnam par gzhag pa 'dod chags dga' ba dang /
T02D2476:162a-27: thabs rnam par gzhag pa las sgrub pa zhes bya
T02D2476:162a-28: ba yan lag gsum pa rjes thogs su mtshon par
T02D2476:162a-30: sgrub pa bskyod pa yin par bshad //
T02D2476:162a-31: h'um phat dang ni ldan pa'o //
T02D2476:162a-33: de nyid kyi gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2476:162a-34: thams cad dang de'i shes rab kyi ngo bo thabs
T02D2476:162a-35: dang shes rab dag shin tu chags par gyur pas
T02D2476:162a-36: bskyod pa mngon par sbyar bar bya ba dang /
T02D2476:162a-37: mngon par sbyor bar byed pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2476:162a-38: gyis rtsed mos bde ba'i tshor ba gang gi sems
T02D2476:162a-39: myos shing dga' bar gyur pa gang yin pa de
T02D2476:162a-40: ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D2476:162a-41: nga rgyal dang dregs pa ste khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa phyag rgya las rig par bya'o //
T02D2476:162a-42: de nyid sems las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2476:162b-0: 'dod chags rdo rje nyid @162b kyi khongs su gtogs
T02D2476:162b-1: pa yin pas des na sgrub pa'i yan lag logs
T02D2476:162b-3: de'i rjes la shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med
T02D2476:162b-4: par snang ba shin tu bsgoms pa las byung ba'i
T02D2476:162b-5: mchog tu dga' ba ro mnyam par gyur pa na
T02D2476:162b-6: / gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags kyi rgyu ba
T02D2476:162b-7: rnams rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dmigs
T02D2476:162b-8: / nas / rtsed mo mchog gi bya ba'i ye
T02D2476:162b-9: shes kyi bsgrub bya la mngon du phyogs pa'i las
T02D2476:162b-10: kyi mtshan nyid mthar phyin pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa
T02D2476:162b-11: gang yin pa de phyag rgya las rig par bya'o
T02D2476:162b-12: / nas / // de nyid du gang rdo rje
T02D2476:162b-13: nor bu'i rtsa ba'i nang du byang chub kyi sems
T02D2476:162b-14: bde ba chen po dang lhan cig skye ba na
T02D2476:162b-15: skul bar byed pa de ni rlung gi khams so
T02D2476:162b-16: / nas / // // byang chub kyi sems g-yo
T02D2476:162b-17: ba'i reg pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes gang yin
T02D2476:162b-18: pa rtsed mo'i bstan bcos ma lus pa las bstan
T02D2476:162b-19: pa'i bya ba 'jug pa'i skabs med pa'i yang dag
T02D2476:162b-20: pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyis rdo rje nyid
T02D2476:162b-21: bsgrub bya la mngon par phyogs pa'i las kyi rab
T02D2476:162b-22: tu rtogs par bya ba skul bar byed pa rjes
T02D2476:162b-23: thogs nyid du 'bras bu mngon par sgrub par byed
T02D2476:162b-24: pa gang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
T02D2476:162b-25: la sogs pa rnams ro mnyam pa'i ngo bo'i tshor
T02D2476:162b-26: ba nang gi reg pa nyams su myong ba'i mtshan
T02D2476:162b-28: dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de dang
T02D2476:162b-29: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de ci rigs par
T02D2476:162b-30: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa dang /
T02D2476:162b-31: phrag dog dang 'dod pa dang dam tshig sgrol ma dang /
T02D2476:162b-32: longs spyod du rnam par gzhag pa dam tshig rdo rje dang rdo rje dga' ma ste /
T02D2476:162b-33: thabs rnam par gzhag pa las 'dod chags dang zhe
T02D2476:162b-34: sdang gti mug rab tu rgyu ba bzhi ba nyid
T02D2476:162b-35: dang / bde ba shin tu 'jug pa dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T02D2476:162b-36: nges par 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur pas sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba ste /
